name: Breaking Heaven
description:
This game was made for Mini Jam #119: Heaven.

The Devil has invaded Heaven, intending to purge it's inhabitants to bring them down to Hell as his servants... Survive as long as possible in this strategic 2D action game!

Controls:

Right and Left Arrows: Move

X: Jump

Z: Attack

Z while running: Running Attack

Z in the air: Dash

Items: 

Heart: Heal 1 heart

Green Arrow: Increase speed

Purple Arrow: Increase jump height

Shield: Increase chance to negate damage

Gold Heart: Heal to full health

Side Notes:

While I wouldn't exactly classify this game as a "bullet hell", your objective is to avoid projectiles and kill... Well, everything, which I think fits the limitation pretty well. I feel this project is at a relatively complete and enjoyable stage, although much could be added to make it better. I'm not sure if I'll ever make a finished version of this, but feel free to give suggestions in case I do :)

Credits:

All music, art, sfx, and concepts are made by me. Uhh thanks to religion for the concepts of heaven and hell I guess???
